title: RFE: stream-oriented versions of strings.Unquote, strconv.ParseInt, etc
body:
I often find myself needing variants of the basic parsing functions (strconv.ParseInt, strings.Unquote, and so on) that consume a prefix of an input string and return the unconsumed part.  I realize you can accomplish this using text/scanner, but it is complex and heavyweight.

Could we add these to the standard library?
